description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              -  Is responsible for delivering on financial targets in the assigned Key Accounts in line with
              
              the strategy of Boehringer Ingelheim Animal Health Vietnam LLC (BIAH Vietnam).
              
              -   Is responsible for collaborating and supporting BIAH Vietnam’s distributor in planning
              
              and executing technical seminars/ in-house training/consultancies/commercial trial
              
              and marketing activities to reach agreed sales targets.
              
              -   Is responsible for executing the sales/marketing plan and tactics to assure maximum sales
              
              and market penetration within guidelines, policies and directives with key customers.
              

              Duties & Responsibilities:
              
              -  Deliver on the agreed financial targets.
              
              -   Monitor local market conditions for changes that impact BIAH Vietnam business
              
              -   Achieve strategic distributor objectives in line with BIAH Vietnam strategy.
              
              -   Drive, monitor and maximize marketing activities for distributor and its customers. Adjust
              
              implementation plans on a regular basis (promotion management, business development…)
              
              -  Have excellent understanding of customer priorities/needs and keep abreast of changes
              
              in the local animal health economy
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              -  Doctor of Veterinary Medicine or Bachelor of Veterinary and Animal Science
              
              -  More than five year experiences in Technical and sales, preferred in relevant industries with proven track record.
              
              -  Ability in problem - solving and negotiation
              
              -   Must be self-motivated, responsible and flexible
              
              -   Customer understanding
              
              -   Proven ability to work cross-functional
              
              -   Interpersonal and communication skills
              
              -  English skill required
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
